sqlMap.select: SELECT coi_id , coi_code , coi_name , coi_remark , coi_createtime FROM const_info
SELECT coi_id , coi_code , coi_name , coi_remark , coi_createtime FROM const_info WHERE (coi_id = #coiId#)
SELECT coi_id , coi_code , coi_name , coi_remark , coi_createtime FROM const_info WHERE (coi_code = #value#)
SELECT coi_id , coi_code , coi_name , coi_remark , coi_createtime FROM const_info WHERE (coi_name = #value#)
SELECT coi_id , coi_code , coi_name , coi_remark , coi_createtime FROM const_info WHERE (coi_remark = #value#)
SELECT coi_id , coi_code , coi_name , coi_remark , coi_createtime FROM const_info WHERE (coi_createtime = #value#)
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO const_info ( coi_id , coi_code , coi_name , coi_remark , coi_createtime ) VALUES ( #coiId# , #coiCode# , #coiName# , #coiRemark# , #coiCreatetime# )
select @@identity as value
sqlMap.update: UPDATE const_info SET coi_code = #coiCode# , coi_name = #coiName# , coi_remark = #coiRemark# , coi_createtime = #coiCreatetime# WHERE (coi_id = #coiId#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT coi_id , coi_code , coi_name , coi_remark , coi_createtime FROM const_info WHERE (coi_id = #coiId#)
